text: Michel Zumkeller (born 21 January 1966 in Belfort) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Territoire de Belfort department, and is a member of the Union of Democrats and Independents as part of the Radical Party. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:People from Belfort Category:Republican Party (France) politicians Category:Union for French Democracy politicians Category:Liberal Democracy (France) politicians Category:Radical Party (France) politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 15th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Union of Democrats and Independents politicians
title: Michel Zumkeller
